name: Bit Boys
description:
Submitted to Global Game Jam 2017. The theme was 'Waves'.

---

Make the crowd jump like waves as you play! Each band member will have 3 keyboard keys assign. You have to press the keys in the correct order, following the lineup of the band members.

Invite all your friends to play! Play it fast and get the higher score! Enjoy the music! Use your speakers!!!

Up to four players.
